data.title: It’s the best gift, says Zara’s former teacher
data.meta_description: To Datin Azian Ahmad Shaharbi, the marriage between her former student Zara Salim Davidson and the Raja Muda of Perak Raja Dr Nazrin Shah will be the best Teachers Day present she could ever receive.
data.text:
Nation

IPOH: To Datin Azian Ahmad Shaharbi, the marriage between her former student Zara Salim Davidson and the Raja Muda of Perak Raja Dr Nazrin Shah will be the best Teachers Day present she could ever receive.
